channel.title: Need a real good ban appel
channel.description:
Hey i need a real good ban appel...
my account was stolen when i was just starting runescape i was about 53 back then it was sorta a good staker (didnt notice) and the guy who stole it banned it for account stealing and offencive language after a few monthing trying to get jagex 2 give it to me they do but its banned...
Please and Thanks Scotty™

item.title: Need a real good ban appel
item.dc:creator: @Time Time
item.description:
@Time wrote:

Dear Fagex, I mean jagex…
My friends at school told there brother about my high level runescape account, they gatherd their friends and mugged me in the park, behind bushes they anus rapped me hard until I gave them my password, the next day when I logged in they got me banned for macroing. How far is this, first I get rapped then banned on my favorite game!?

Read full topic

[quote="##Zach##, post:12, topic:46301"][quote][size=20pt]Dear Jagex,

Don’t you have anything else better to do besides f’ing banning me? You f’ing a’holes!! First, you change the interface…second, you ban SS…third, this!!! This is a conspiracy!!! You F’ING D**KS DON’T HAVE ANYTHING ELSE BETTER TO DO BESIDES HARRASSING ME!!! F U.

Sincerely,
_________[/size][/quote][/quote]rofl that might work cough

item.title: Need a real good ban appel
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

man u 4eva9:

if you only jus got your accout back just say i havent been on it and stuff, i only just got it back and he banned it for me, and unforutnley java is right if oyu are a member and 90+ they will listen to you more, thats levelist i would say though, a level 76 could get hacked a level 3 could jagex should still listen what ever level i think

He’s saying they read the response instead of automating one, dumbass. Also, they can easily tell you’re the one that’s been on the account by checking your I.P. and recent I.P.'s. Unless he’s be using a different computer or proxying for some strange reason, that isn’t going to work.

Read full topic
